tool_description: Schedules screening appointments for potential clinical trial participants, coordinating availability between patients, investigators, and required resources.

appointment_type.description: Type of screening appointment (initial_screening, medical_assessment, lab_work, imaging, consent_visit, final_screening)

preferred_dates.description: Patient's preferred appointment dates in ISO 8601 format

investigator_id.description: Specific investigator requested for the appointment

error_messages: Invalid appointment type: appointment_type must be one of [initial_screening, medical_assessment, lab_work, imaging, consent_visit, final_screening].
Invalid duration: duration_hours must be between 0.5-8 hours.
Invalid date format: All preferred_dates must be valid ISO 8601 date-time format and in the future.
No availability: No appointment slots available for the requested dates and duration.
Investigator unavailable: Specified investigator_id is not available for the requested time periods.
usage: Provide patient_id, appointment_type, preferred_dates array, and duration_hours. Optionally specify investigator_id and special_requirements. The tool finds and books the best available slot.

appointment_id.description: Unique identifier for the scheduled appointment

assigned_investigator.description: Investigator assigned to conduct the appointment

location.description: Location where the appointment will take place

preparation_instructions.description: Instructions for patient preparation before appointment

scheduling_status.description: Status of the scheduling attempt (confirmed, pending, waitlisted)
